data.title: Bitcoin (BTC) Price Extends Recovery On Seemingly “Moderate” U.S.-Russia Sanctions
data.text: Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies extended a recovery on Wednesday as recent U.S. sanctions against Russia were perceived to have minimal economic impact. Bitcoin rose nearly 6% to $38,967 from a near one-month low hit on Tuesday, while altcoins including Ethereum, Binance Coin and XRP added between 4% to 5%.
